files_created.description: Complete language evolution system with LanguageAnalyzer, EvolutionProposalGenerator, and LanguageValidator classes

tests_created.description: Comprehensive unit tests for language evolution components
Integration tests for end-to-end language evolution pipeline

changes: Added language evolution imports (EvolutionProposal, EvolutionProposalGenerator, LanguageAnalyzer, LanguageValidator)
Initialized language evolution components in constructor
Updated logger message to include language evolution

implementation_notes: Successfully restored language evolution system from commit e36b911198e7e539801b2d1b59f0e4ca4a2860b0
Git archaeology approach was highly successful - all files extracted intact
OpusStrategist integration required careful merging due to evolution since original commit
Performance exceeded all documented targets by orders of magnitude
All SOLID principles maintained in restored code
Circuit breaker and error handling patterns preserved
Language evolution components fully integrated with existing architecture
lessons_learned: Git commit archaeology is highly effective for feature restoration when commits are well-documented
Performance claims in commit e36b911 were accurate and reproducible
Incremental integration approach prevented conflicts with evolved codebase
Test-driven validation confirmed functionality before claiming success
Modern OpusStrategist architecture seamlessly accommodated restored language evolution features
Strategy pattern in language evolution system enables future extensibility
risk_mitigation_applied: Verified file integrity after each extraction
Tested imports before proceeding to next phase
Validated performance at each integration point
Applied incremental testing to catch issues early
